watsonx Code Assistant for Z

Modernize mainframe applications faster, with lower risks and costs with the purpose-built coding assistant
Try product tour Book a live demo

Accelerate Z modernization with AI

IBMÂ® watsonx Code AssistantÂ® for Z accelerates mainframe application development and modernization with AI and automation. It supports developers in every phase of lifecycleâ€”from application discovery and analysis to automated refactoring, code explanation, generation, optimization and transformation to newer languages and testing. The outcome? Lower modernization risks, enhanced developer productivity and skill sets plus faster time to value.
National Organization for Social Insurance (NOSI) case study
Modernize your mainframe with agentic workflows
Full application lifecycle support 

Access AI and automation tooling to support the end-to-end application modernization lifecycle.
Agentic mainframe developer experience

Empower developers with an agentic workflow that proactively understand goals, automate tasks, driving development forward with smart, goal-aware assistance.
Incremental approach

Minimize costs and risks with incremental modernization and dynamic refactoring. Get flexibility to use your choice of language (COBOL/Java) with interoperability
Deployment flexibility  

Deploy where you wantâ€”on premises or with hybrid cloudâ€”to meet your unique business needs.

 

Reimagine business-critical code with AI-assisted modernization

See why Omdia says automation accelerates delivery and reduces risk for mainframe teams.

Download the report

Capabilities

Discover how IBM watsonx Code Assistant for Z streamlines mainframe application modernization and boosts developer productivity. Explore the product's key capabilties and see it in action with our interactive demo.

 Explore the interactive demo
Understand Explain Generate Refactor Optimize Transform and Validate

Understand your application landscape

Gain clear insight into your mainframe applications, their relationships and dependencies with automated discovery and analysis. Use AI agents to understand mainframe code and document business logic faster.

Explain code in natural language

Use AI agents to create natural language explanations of code and technical documentation, reducing the knowledge gap, streamlining documentation and accelerating modernization strategies.

Generate code with precision

Generate new COBOL code with natural language prompts through a chat interface or get real-time in-line code suggestions on the go with AI. Develop with precision and speed as we leverage fine-tuned LLM trained on IBM ZÂ®.

Auto-refactor into modular services

Discover the programs and data needed to automatically refactor your COBOL and PL/I applications into modular business services. Improve accuracy and reduce the developer time and skill required with automated code refactoring. 

Optimize code for performance

Get prioritized insights on performance inefficienciesâ€”identifying issues at the source code level through an in-depth analysis of COBOL modulesâ€”to improve application performance and streamline development.

Convert COBOL to Java in minutes

Use generative AI to accelerate COBOL to high quality Java transformations in minutes, not months. Next, accelerate testing with auto-generated unit tests to compare semantic equivalence of new Java service to original COBOL code, gaining confidence in the language transformation and reducing risk. Maintain IBM Z runtimes and quality of services with interoperability, integration and enterprise standardization.

Use cases

COBOL modernization

Whether you want to understand, manage, modernize or build COBOL applications from scratch, IBM watsonx Code Assistant for Z assists you right in your IDE.
